mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.chat_record AS "chatRecord", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", so.name AS "office.name", su.name AS "user.name", suu.name as "createBy.name", uss.name as "updateBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON so.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = a.user_id left join sys_user suu on suu.id=a.create_id left join sys_user uss on uss.id=a.update_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_chat_record( id, office_id, user_id, chat_record, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{user.id}, #{chatRecord}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_chat_record SET office_id = #{office.id}, user_id = #{user.id}, chat_record = #{chatRecord}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
